content:
Sure! Here are a few examples of popular songs that feature Mellotron samples:

1. "Strawberry Fields Forever" by The Beatles - This classic song uses a Mellotron flute loop to create the dreamy intro section.
2. "Kashmir" by Led Zeppelin - The iconic Mellotron strings are the backbone of the epic chorus in this song.
3. "Nothing Else Matters" by Metallica - The Mellotron strings add a haunting quality to the introspective ballad.
4. "Champagne Supernova" by Oasis - A Mellotron flute loop can be heard in the instrumental break of this Britpop hit.
5. "Fluorescent Adolescent" by Arctic Monkeys - The Mellotron choir sound can be heard in the intro and choruses of this indie-rock anthem.

Overall, the Mellotron has had a significant impact on music, and its samples continue to be widely used in various genres today.
